column2: I love her. I loved her from the first moment I beheld her; and that was at an evening-party in Mayfair
column3: at precisely twenty-four minutes past ten o'clock on Thursday evening

column1: 2224|10:24|Thanks to ten minutes or so of balmy weather
column2: by 10:24 the Earth is covered in the great carboniferous forests whose residues give us all our coal
column3: and the first winged insects are evident.
